title: "ElevenLab's AI voice-generating technology is expanding to 30 languages"
excerpt: "Eleven Multilingual v2 supports 30 languages and allows people around the world to use ElevenLabs' text-to-speech and voice-cloning capabilities. When users input text, the model automatically identifies the written language and generates speech with \"an unprecedented level of authenticity\", according to the release."
